reviewText: Returned home from Sicily recently. Watching DVD was almost like being their. It represents the beauty and glory of this magical island.

Wonderful DVD weather you have been or are going
Ruin do NOT walk and buy this....
Enjoyable entertaining Unless you go to Italy twice a year you need to have a DVD library of Italy to make the distance tolerable.

Although I have visited Italy, I have not visited Sicily but this DVD is an excellent example.

C. L. Heath

I am planning a trip to Sicilia and bought this video to get an idea of what to expect. The video is nice; you will not lose your money buying it. Unfortunately, the narrator's voice is at times difficult to understand. Also, I think that it would be best if along with a city's name, they show its location in the map. I watched the video with a map of Sicilia at hand but sometimes I was unable to find the places she has speaking about.
This video shows very important sites in the island. In this sense it is very good. However, it is like a catalog, like, 1,2,3,4 and so on. There is no separation of sites by groups (e.g., archeological sites or beaches) or any type of clear order. The narrator's voice is monotonous too. So, if you are planning a trip without a tour like me, you're left without recommendations that could help you organize it.
Other than these shortcomings, it is still a good video to watch, image quality is excellent.
Disappointed most of the time spent reviewing church's, different to to my visits of the island.
nice but in the boring side

Shows places all over the island, although in no apparent order. Good scenery and overviews, but overall quality is just okay. Narrator's pronunciations of some people and place names are way off the mark. Stressing the wrong syllable in Trpani is one thing, but "Dionysus" sounding similar to "hypothesis" is just silly.

This was  sort of a recap for me of a recent trip to Sicily but it made me wish I had seen the video before I took the trip.  This is an especially well done video that features some of the major cities in Sicily. It also features some of the major sites of interest to tourists and those who have an interest in the antiquities. This is a must-see video for anyone planning a visit to Sicily.
Shaky handheld camera footage makes this amateur video difficult to watch
Terribly fast review with a little musical number repeated, repeated, repeated
A little boring, hard to make it to the end. It is okay if you have never seen or heard anything about the cities in Italy, but for someone who has been there, it didn't add any new knowledge.
Nice systematic introduction to the main sites in Sicily.  Good starting place for planning a trip. That's all there is folks.
